text: Elisabeth Lichtenberger (17 February 1925 - 14 February 2017) was an Austrian geographer. She taught at the University of Vienna. She was born in Vienna. She was awarded the Austrian Decoration for Science and Art in 1999. She was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1991. Lichtenberger died on 14 February 2017 in Vienna, aged 91. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Austrian academics Category:European geographers Category:Scientists from Vienna Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Elisabeth Lichtenberger
